publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-800.1 Dr Richard Simpson: Cross Party Report on Leukaemiaâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-800) in the name of Keith Brown, leave out from "calls on the Minister for Public Health" to end and insert "welcomes the decision by the Beauly to Denny public inquiry reporters to admit fresh health evidence but calls on the Scottish Executive to invite the Health Protection Agency to undertake and publish a review of all the health evidence prior to a final decision being reached." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-800.1 Cross Party Report on Leukaemia (lodged on 19 December 2007) Paul Martin*, Claire Baker*, Trish Godman*, David Whitton*, Elaine Murray*
